attributes.action: send troops into Zimbabwe and arrest/kill Robert Mugabe for crimes against humanity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For long enough this waster has murdered, tortued and failed his own people. Let's bring him to justice.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=reduce+fuel+tax&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
